Title: LG Showcases Advanced Commercial Laundry Solutions at Clean Show 2025
Summary: Aug. 25, 2025 — LG Electronics (LG) is presenting its advanced commercial laundry solutions at Clean Show 2025, North America’s largest commercial laundry industry tradeshow, in Orlando, Florida (August 23–26). LG’s exhibit features a wide range of professional and commercial laundry products tailored to the diverse needs of laundromats, hotels, healthcare facilities and other commercial operators. Equipped with AI-driven precision washing technologies, the company’s latest solutions deliver powerful performance, excellent energy efficiency and significant operational savings.

Title: LG Gallery+ Turns LG TVs Into Design Elements That Personalize Your Living Space
Summary: , 2025 — LG Electronics (LG) today announced the availability of LG Gallery+, a new visual curation service that enriches living spaces to reflect the unique style and mood of each user. Featuring over 4,000 selected images, personalization options and adaptive smart features, LG Gallery+ shapes the ambiance of a space through art, creativity and atmosphere.
